titleInfo.title: Brought to the First Distric Police Prison.

mods.abstract: BROUGHT to the First District Police Prison-- JOHN BAPTISTE, a black, about 21 years old, 5 feet 8 inches high ; says he belongs to Mr. Macklin. SOLOMON, a griffe, about 50 years old, 5 feet 8 1/2 inches high ; says he belongs to Mr. Gannie Lizarde. EDWARD, a dark griffe, about 14 years old, 4 feet 7 1/2 inches high, bold on top of head ; says he belongs to Mr. Peron. JIM, a light griffe, about 25 years old, 5 feet 6 inches high ; says he belongs to Mr. Bentley. ALBERT, a dark griffe, about 84 years old, 5 feet 4 1/2 inches high; says he belongs to Mr. James. MATHEW, a dark griffe, about 40 years old, 5 feet 2 1/2 inches high ; says he belongs to Mr. James. The owners will please comply with the law respecting them. NewOrleans, August 11, 1852--1aw3w J. WORRALL, Warden.
mods.note: black; griff; dark griff; light griff
Mr. Macklin; Mr. Gannie Lizarde; Mr. Peron; Mr. Bentley; Mr. James
John Baptiste (21); Solomon (50); Edward (14); Jim (25); Albert (84); Mathew (40)

detail.title: New Orleans daily crescent. ([New Orleans, La.]) 1851-1866

mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Department, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Louisiana Runaway Slave Advertisements, 1836-1865, Louisiana Digital Library, Baton Rouge, La.
